SELECT COUNT(GENDER) FROM MEMBER WHERE GENDER = 'm' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, LOWER('YY-MM-DD')) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, LOWER('YY-MM-DD')) OR GENDER = 'M' OR GENDER = '남자'
SELECT COUNT(GENDER) FROM MEMBER WHERE GENDER = 'm' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, LOWER('YY-MM-DD')) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, LOWER('YY-MM-DD')) OR GENDER = 'M' OR GENDER = '남자'

SELECT COUNT(GENDER) FROM MEMBER WHERE GENDER = 'f' AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, LOWER('YY-MM-DD')) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, LOWER('YY-MM-DD')) OR GENDER = 'F' OR GENDER = '여자'

SELECT ORDER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NAME , USER_NICKNAME , BOOK_NAME , AMOUNT , ORDER_DATE , DELIVERY FROM MEMBER JOIN "ORDER" USING(USER_NO) JOIN ORDER_DETAIL USING(ORDER_NO) JOIN BOOK USING(BOOK_ID) WHERE DELIVERY = '상품준비중' AND ORDERCHANGE = 0
UPDATE "ORDER" SET DELIVERY = '배송완료' WHERE ORDER_NO = ?

SELECT O.ORDER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NAME , USER_NICKNAME , USER_PHONE , BOOK_NAME , AMOUNT , ORDERCHANGE FROM "ORDER" O JOIN ORDER_DETAIL D ON(O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO) JOIN BOOK B ON(B.BOOK_ID = D.BOOK_ID) JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.USER_NO = O.USER_NO) WHERE NOT ORDERCHANGE = 0
UPDATE "ORDER" SET ORDERCHANGE = 0 WHERE ORDER_NO = ?
SELECT SUM(SALE_PRICE * AMOUNT) FROM ORDER_DETAIL JOIN BOOK USING(BOOK_ID) JOIN "ORDER" USING(ORDER_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, LOWER('YY-MM-DD')) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, LOWER('YY-MM-DD'))
SELECT SUM(SALE_PRICE * AMOUNT) FROM ORDER_DETAIL JOIN BOOK USING(BOOK_ID) JOIN "ORDER" USING(ORDER_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, LOWER('YY-MM-DD')) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, LOWER('YY-MM-DD'))
SELECT SUM(SALE_PRICE * AMOUNT) FROM ORDER_DETAIL JOIN BOOK USING(BOOK_ID) JOIN "ORDER" USING(ORDER_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, LOWER('YY-MM-DD')) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-2, LOWER('YY-MM-DD'))

SELECT SUM(SALE_PRICE * AMOUNT) FROM ORDER_DETAIL JOIN BOOK USING(BOOK_ID) JOIN "ORDER" USING(ORDER_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, LOWER('YY-MM-DD')) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-5, LOWER('YY-MM-DD'))
SELECT SUM(SALE_PRICE * AMOUNT) FROM ORDER_DETAIL JOIN BOOK USING(BOOK_ID) JOIN "ORDER" USING(ORDER_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, LOWER('YY-MM-DD')) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-6, LOWER('YY-MM-DD'))
